definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
star anise-flavored fava beans (snack from Shaoxing, Zhejiang province)

sentences.english: Thick spears of asparagus and fennel were draped with thinly sliced ham.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的蘆筍和茴香夾在切的薄薄的火腿片裏。

sentences.english: Organic essential oils of fennel, bergamot, verbena and cedarwood essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 茴香，佛手柑，馬鞭草，雪松等有機單方精油。

sentences.english: The sweet orange and aniseed add intense aromas.
sentences.chinese: 香草茶中的甜橙和大茴香使口味俞加濃烈。

sentences.english: A faint anise smell is on the air, goldenrod scent.
sentences.chinese: 一絲淡淡的茴香，瀰漫在空氣中，還有黃花的芬芳。

sentences.english: Also showing in numbers now are the fennel shoots and onion sets.
sentences.chinese: 茴香的新芽和洋蔥的植株現在也顯得多了起來。

sentences.english: My sister plants a lot of china-only vegetables, such as fennel and chinese cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹種很多隻有中國纔有的菜，比如茴香和中國黃瓜。

sentences.english: Every time I cook I use spice.
sentences.chinese: 我每次炒菜都要放八角茴香。

sentences.english: Skewer of lobster grilled on a plancha, topped with fennel, coral of sea urchin and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 香烤龍蝦串，玉米麪糊配海膽，茴香和魚子醬。

sentences.english: For toothpaste I use a mixture of cuttlefish bone and wild fennel seeds.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏我用墨魚骨和野生茴香種子混合而成。

sentences.english: Mom has bought some fennel beans for Dad to go with the wine.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買了茴香豆給爸爸做下酒菜。

sentences.english: Add the tomatoes and fennel seeds and cook for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 添加準備好的番茄和茴香籽再煮一分鐘。

sentences.english: Do you know how to write the character Hui as the anise in the anise beans?
sentences.chinese: 茴香豆的茴字，怎樣寫的？

sentences.english: Moreover, the components and content of star anise oil had no obvious difference under three extracting conditions.
sentences.chinese: 三種萃取方法所得八角茴香油的成分和含量差異不大。

sentences.english: Set aside. Toss squash with oil, then cumin mixture.
sentences.chinese: 將南瓜拌油然後加入茴香等香料。

sentences.english: Smoked salmon, fennel & asparagus salad, mustard dressing.
sentences.chinese: 煙燻三文魚，茴香，蘆筍色拉配芥末調味汁。

sentences.english: Bohemians also burn sugar into their absinthe to mellow its bitter anise flavour.
sentences.chinese: 波希米亞人也將糖放入苦艾酒中以減少茴香的苦味。
